name: Intech Software(Intech group of companies)
description: Deals in all Kinds of IT Solutions,
overview:
Intech Software is young & dynamic agency providing development and consultancy solutions to SMEs, enterprises and start-ups. We have over 300 client around the world. We specialise in diverse solutions including web 2.0 design and development, enterprise web applications, PHP and .NET development, eCommerce solutions, CMS websites, Flex/Flash based RIAs, iPhone/iPad apps, BlackBerry apps, SEO and social media marketing.

Here is a list of our services Web Development

Web 2.0 Design and Development Flex, Flash and Rich Internet Apps Enterprise Web Applications Social Media, Mash-ups and Facebook Apps CMS and e-Commerce Solutions SaaS, Amazon AWS and Salesforce Consulting Mobile Development Solutions
